data.title: Bodegas Castillo de Peñafiel, S.L. Legal notice
data.meta_description: Castillo de Peñafiel Winery, in the heart of the Ribera del Duero region, presents its red wines Coso Joven and Viejo Coso, awarded with the gold medal in Bordeaux -Challenge du vin- 2007
data.text:
Legal notice

This web site has been developed by Bodegas Castillo de Peñafiel S.L. for the difusion of its activity. Accessing this web site implies that the user aknowledges and accepts the following terms. Usage of this web site does not imply in any way the establishment of any kind of relationship (eg. commercial) between the web site user and Bodegas Castillo de Peñafiel, S.L.

viejocoso.es domain name is registered in favour of "Bodegas Castillo de Peñafiel, S.L." which is addressed, for any kind of communication related to this web site and this legal notice, in Ctra. de Pesquera 12, 47300 Peñafiel. Spain.

Bodegas Castillo de Peñafiel S.L. assumes no responsibility from an ilegal or non proper use of the information published in this web site. Otherwise stated by law, Bodegas Castillo de Peñafiel S.L. will not be responsible for the truthfulness or correctness of the information set in this web site.

Any kind of content in this web site, including but not limited to text, images, designs, source code, photographs, logos, etc., belong to Bodegas Castillo de Peñafiel, S.L., and are protected by law. For any third party claim on the intelectual property rights of any content, please, contact us at the address stated in this legal notice.
